```{r}
final_expr_full <- read.csv("~/Documents/Glass_Lab/data/final_expr.txt", sep = "\t")
```



```{r}
ncols <- ncol(final_expr_full)
big_network <- cor(t(final_expr_full))


results <- lapply(seq(1, ncols), function(i) {
  ncols * big_network - (ncols - 1) * cor(t(final_expr_full[,-i]))
})

names(results) <- colnames(final_expr_full)
```

```{r}
saveRDS(results, "~/Documents/Glass_Lab/data/filtered_results.rds")
```
